definition: to become brutal or insensitive and unfeeling
details:
verb
- to become brutal or insensitive and unfeeling
= example: to become brutal or insensitive and unfeeling
= synonyms: animalize, animalise
- to make unfeeling or inhuman
= example: to make unfeeling or inhuman
= synonyms: animalize, animalise
- to treat brutally
= example: to treat brutally
